软件包 org.opengoss.core
的使用

使用 org.opengoss.core 的软件包
org.opengoss.core Core plugin of OpenCore SOA Platform to support Ioc and ExtensionPoint based on OSGi. 
org.opengoss.core.internal.descriptor Implementations of service and extension points registry. 
org.opengoss.core.internal.registry XML parser that parse "META-MF/plugin.xml" and build the element descriptors. 
 

org.opengoss.core 使用的 org.opengoss.core 中的类
IExtensionRegistry
          ExtensionPoint and extension registry.
IPluginContext
          A plugin's execution context that is used by the plugin to interact with the OSGi and OpenCore framework.
IPluginServiceRegistry
          The plugin services registry.
IRegistry
          Interface of hierachical registry.
IServiceRegistry
          Read-only service registry.
UID
          UID is the abbreviation of Universal Identifier that comply with URN rules.
UID.MalformedUIDException
           
 

org.opengoss.core.internal.descriptor 使用的 org.opengoss.core 中的类
UID
          UID is the abbreviation of Universal Identifier that comply with URN rules.
 

org.opengoss.core.internal.registry 使用的 org.opengoss.core 中的类
IExtensionRegistry
          ExtensionPoint and extension registry.
IPluginServiceRegistry
          The plugin services registry.
IRegistry
          Interface of hierachical registry.
IServiceRegistry
          Read-only service registry.
Registry
          A Hierachical registry.
UID
          UID is the abbreviation of Universal Identifier that comply with URN rules.
